'''Duillond''' is an Elven city located at the [[Lhûn]] in the [[Ered Luin]] in the game ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'', upstream from [[Celondim]].

Duillond was founded by the Elves that survived the Fall of [[Edhelion]]. They first removed to [[Gondamon]], but afterwards came even more eastward to where they are now, in Duillond.<ref name="LOTROW">{{LOTROW|Duillond|2025-08-13}}</ref>

It sits at the entry of [[Ered Luin]] and north of [[Celondim]], where they still had good relationships with, dating back from the wood trading between it and Edhelion.<ref name="LOTROW"/>

It is also in the south of Duillond that the Spring Festival is held, in the Garden of Duillond.

==Etymology==
''Duillond'' means "River-haven", because it is a combination of ''dui'', which stands for "river"<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''river''</ref> and ''lond'', which stands for "haven".<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''londë''</ref>
